review: I have a Google ChromeCast and now I have the new FireTV Stick as well and it's really awesome. I have both because I look at it like a venn diagram - both do a lot of similar things, but both have things that the other won't do as well.So far the pluses are:1) Much quicker and smoother performance.2) Add-on apps (Spotify, as an example) make the experience even better.3) Amazon Prime content is native to it (of course) - which means, no more do I have to do the janky workaround to get it to play through the ChromeCast - that alone is worth it to me.Cons...The only thing I've come across so far is that the Spotify app does not allow you to just log in and access your content - so most likely other add-on apps will have some similar experience shortcomings. With Spotify, as an example, you have to play the content from your phone or tablet and "fling" it to the tv. Not a big deal.. but a fully integrated app would be a better UX (user experience).
author: Marc Cyr

review: Love this this stick. Very simple to hook up , set up instructions are very helpful. Amazon has a hit here with this product....I did  the pre order deal and got it for $19. I hooked it up on the back of my Yamaha surround receiver that has 4 HDMI inputs. Works well for me that way as my TV does not have any HDMI inputs. I will now sell my Roku and quit using my Blue ray player to stream. Highly recommend purchasing this product .
author: J. F. Vogel "Road Runner"

review: I have AppleTV which I love but this is absolutely on par in every way. If you are an amazon lover and Prime user, you will NOT be disappointed. My friend has the Google ChromeCast. Don't even think about getting that compared to this. All your apps are in the stick, not driven by another device. Great stuff!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I took advantage of the Prime sale when the Fire TV Stick was first announced. I received my two units today. I'm extremely impressed with this product. Set-up was incredibly easy. Using the included remote is good, but the Android app is amazing. Streaming quality is terrific, selection is very good, and being able to view pictures and videos from the Amazon Cloud is just a great extra. I'm very impressed.
author: David Martella

review: Love it,  this little stick has it all. I only had it for a few hours and I am loving it.  The whole family is loving It.  Now my better half can watch her show by clicking a link on the kindle instead of having to hook up the kindle to the TV, given this is not a trivial task but it is for some people.I can listen to a Greek Radio station using  tunin radio, I can stream content from my kindle fire, I can watch history channel, my son can play games.  It is far beyond smart than I imagined it!!  it.
